title: New: King Midas – You Know My Name/Snow
content:
Fresh from last November’s release Rosso, ‘You Know My Name’ is the latest single from Norwegian Grammy-nominated (I know) King Midas.

It’s a slice of Duran Duran-esque synthpop joy, accentuated by Per Vigmostad’s voice – one that was made for this kind of music – and a nice little bit of sax towards the end. Whilst we’re at it, give ‘Snow’ a listen, too. It’s even better. https://soundcloud.com/tigerfysisiskformat/kingmidas01snow?in=tigerfysisiskformat/sets/king-midas-rosso-singles https://soundcloud.com/tigerfysisiskformat/king-midas-you-know-my-name?in=tigerfysisiskformat/sets/king-midas-rosso-singles
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d16
